item.title: 西班牙第三季度 GDP 季度增长率确认为 0.8%--最终数据
item.description: 西班牙国家统计局（INE）周一称，西班牙第三季度国内生产总值增长 0.8%，证实了路透社调查的分析师的预期和初步读数。【原文：Spain's gross domestic product grew 0.8% in the third quarter, the country's National Statistics Institute (INE) said on Monday, confirming the expectations of analysts polled by Reuters and the preliminary reading.】

item.title: 意大利反垄断机构对斯南-埃迪森天然气储存交易展开调查
item.description: 意大利反垄断机构（AGCM）周一表示，已对 Edison 将其天然气存储部门出售给天然气电网运营商 Snam 一事展开调查。【原文：Italy's antitrust agency (AGCM) said on Monday it had opened an investigation into Edison's sale of its gas storage unit to gas grid operator Snam .】

item.title: 法国欧莱雅收购 Migros 的韩国化妆品部门
item.description: 法国化妆品巨头欧莱雅周一表示，已与瑞士零售商 Migros 签订协议，收购后者旗下的韩国护肤品业务 Gowoonsesang Cosmetics，其中包括护肤品牌 Dr.G。【原文：French cosmetics giant L'Oreal said on Monday it had signed a deal with Swiss retailer Migros to buy the latter's South Korean skincare business Gowoonsesang Cosmetics, which includes the skin care brand Dr.G.】

item.title: 英国保险公司 Aviva 将以 46.5 亿美元收购 Direct Line
item.description: 英国英杰华保险公司（Aviva）周一表示，该公司已达成协议，将以 37 亿英镑（46.5 亿美元）的现金加股票交易收购规模较小的竞争对手 Direct Line，从而成为英国最大的房屋和汽车保险公司。【原文：British insurer Aviva has reached an agreement to buy smaller rival Direct Line in a 3.7 billion pound ($4.65 billion) cash-and-stock deal, the companies said on Monday, creating the UK's largest home and motor insurer.】

item.title: 美国酒吧消费额缩水预示着酒类生产商的节日喜悦不多
item.description: 米汉-多尔曼（Meaghan Dorman）在纽约经营的五家酒吧在 12 月份一如既往地爆满--挤满了约会的情侣、节日聚会和商务会议。但一算收入，顾客的消费明显减少了。【原文：Meaghan Dorman's five New York bars look just as full as they always do in December - packed with couples on dates, holiday get-togethers and business meet ups. But when takings are counted, it's clear that customers are spending less.】

item.title: 日产前首席执行官戈恩质疑日产与本田联盟的成功
item.description: 戈恩在新闻发布会上说，联盟计划 "没有意义"。【原文：The alliance plans "do not make sense," Ghosn said at a press conference.】

item.title: 拉加德称欧洲央行非常接近实现通胀目标，英国《金融时报》报道
item.description: 欧洲中央银行（ECB）行长克里斯蒂娜-拉加德（Christine Lagarde）周一接受英国《金融时报》采访时表示，欧元区正 "非常接近 "实现央行的中期通胀目标。【原文：European Central Bank (ECB) President Christine Lagarde said the euro zone was getting "very close" to reaching the central bank's medium-term inflation goal, according to an interview published by the Financial Times on Monday.】

item.title: 电力行业首席执行官：欧洲能源税加剧了行业困境
item.description: 欧洲电力游说团体负责人告诉路透社记者，各国政府在想方设法帮助欧洲陷入困境的工业时，应该把目标对准欧洲大陆的高能源税，因为能源税正在削弱竞争力。【原文：Governments hunting for ways to aid Europe's struggling industries should take aim at the continent's high energy taxes, which are eroding competitiveness, the head of Europe's electricity lobby told Reuters.】

item.title: 新加坡 11 月核心通胀率同比为 1.9%，为近三年来最低
item.description: 周一的官方数据显示，11月份新加坡主要消费者物价指数同比上涨1.9%，低于经济学家的预测，是近三年来的最小涨幅。【原文：Singapore's key consumer price gauge rose 1.9% in November on a yearly basis, lower than economists' forecasts and the smallest rise in nearly three years, official data showed on Monday.】

item.title: 2024 年的市场：华尔街的高涨令投资者对美国趋之若鹜
item.description: 今年年初，投资者预期全球股市涨势将消退，美国迅速降息将提振国债，美元走软，新兴市场货币走强，但市场却坚决打破了这一共识。【原文：Markets that began the year with investors expecting a global stock rally to fizzle, swift U.S. interest rate cuts to boost Treasuries and soften the dollar and emerging market currencies to strengthen have firmly defied that consensus.】

item.title: 马来西亚 1MDB 向 Amicorp 集团提出法律索赔，指控其欺诈金额超过 70 亿美元
item.description: 受丑闻影响的马来西亚国家基金 1MDB 周一表示，已向企业服务提供商 Amicorp 集团及其首席执行官提出法律索赔，指控其促成了超过 70 亿美元的欺诈交易。【原文：Scandal-hit Malaysian state fund 1Malaysia Development Berhad has filed a legal claim against corporate services provider Amicorp Group and its CEO alleging it facilitated over $7 billion in fraudulent transactions, 1MDB said on Monday.】

item.title: 西太平洋银行承认向新西兰 24,000 多名客户多收费用
item.description: 新西兰金融监管机构周一表示，澳大利亚西太平洋银行（Westpac）当地分支机构承认未提供广告中宣传的折扣和优惠，从而多收费并误导了 24,000 多名个人和企业客户。【原文：New Zealand's financial regulator on Monday said that Australian lender Westpac's local unit admitted to overcharging and misleading more than 24,000 personal and business customers by not providing advertised discounts and benefits.】

item.title: 美国良性通胀缓解利率忧虑，美元持稳
item.description: 美元周一持稳，此前美国通胀数据显示上月通胀率仅小幅上升，缓解了一些人对美国明年降息步伐的担忧，而日元则在1美元兑156日元附近徘徊，提高了干预的可能性。【原文：The dollar was steady on Monday after U.S. inflation data showed only a modest rise last month, easing some concerns about the pace of U.S. rate cuts next year, while the yen loitered near 156 per dollar, raising the possibility of intervention.】

item.title: 油价坚挺，因希望美国政策支持经济增长
item.description: 周一，美国数据显示通胀降温，重燃明年进一步放宽政策以支持全球经济增长和石油需求的希望，油价与其他风险资产一同走高。【原文：Oil prices inched higher on Monday, along with other risk assets, after U.S. data showed cooling inflation, reviving hopes of further policy easing next year that will support global economic growth and oil demand.】

item.title: 撑起！2025 年全球经济风险叠加
item.description: 全球经济刚刚摆脱 COVID-19 大流行病的影响，2025 年又迎来了一系列新的挑战。【原文：No sooner had the global economy started to put the aftermath of the COVID-19 pandemic behind it than a whole new set of challenges opened up for 2025.】

item.title: 美国通胀缓解，亚洲股市反弹
item.description: 周一，亚洲股市反弹，原因是美国通胀数据良好，恢复了人们对明年进一步放宽政策的希望，同时，华盛顿避免了政府关门，也让人们松了一口气。【原文：Asian shares rallied on Monday after a benign reading on U.S. inflation restored some hope for further policy easing next year, while there was relief that Washington had averted a government shutdown.】

item.title: 调查显示，英国企业士气降至 2024 年低点，但薪酬增长强劲
item.description: 周一公布的一项调查显示，12 月份英国企业信心降至 2024 年以来的最低水平，但雇主们对更广泛的经济持乐观态度，而另一项数据则显示圣诞节前的招聘和薪资有所上升。【原文：British business confidence fell to its lowest level of 2024 in December but employers were a bit more optimistic about the wider economy, according to a survey published on Monday, while separate data showed a pre-Christmas rise in hiring and pay.】

item.title: 据媒体报道，本田和日产将宣布启动整合谈判
item.description: 据日本媒体报道，本田和日产预计将于周一宣布开始业务整合谈判，这两家汽车制造商正寻求在快速变化的行业格局中生存下来。【原文：Honda and Nissan are expected on Monday to announce the start of business integration talks, according to Japanese media reports, as the automakers look to survive a rapidly changing industry landscape.】

item.title: 默多克的新闻集团将把 Foxtel 出售给英国的 DAZN
item.description: 鲁珀特-默多克（Rupert Murdoch）的新闻集团周一表示，将以 34 亿澳元（21.3 亿美元）的价格（包括债务）将旗下澳大利亚有线电视和流媒体业务部门 Foxtel 出售给英国在线体育流媒体和娱乐平台 DAZN。【原文：Rupert Murdoch's News Corp said on Monday it would sell its Australian cable TV and streaming unit Foxtel to British over-the-top sports streaming and entertainment platform, DAZN for A$3.4 billion ($2.13 billion), including debt.】

item.title: 摩根大通退出澳大利亚明星娱乐公司
item.description: 摩根大通周一提交的一份交易所文件显示，摩根大通已不再是陷入困境的澳大利亚赌场运营商星际娱乐公司（Star Entertainment）的股东。【原文：JPMorgan Chase has ceased to be a shareholder in embattled Australian casino operator Star Entertainment , an exchange filing by the gaming group showed on Monday.】

item.title: 特朗普称值得让 TikTok 暂时留在美国
item.description: 美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普周日表示，他赞成允许 TikTok 在美国继续运营至少一段时间，并称他在竞选总统期间在该社交媒体平台上获得了数十亿的浏览量。【原文：President-elect Donald Trump indicated on Sunday that he favored allowing TikTok to keep operating in the United States for at least a little while, saying he had received billions of views on the social media platform during his presidential campaign.】

item.title: Unifor 成员批准与加拿大国家铁路公司的新协议
item.description: Unifor 周日表示，其在加拿大国家铁路公司的成员已经批准了一项新的四年期集体协议，避免了潜在的罢工行动。【原文：Unifor said on Sunday that its members at Canadian National Railway have ratified a new four-year collective agreement, averting a potential strike action.】

item.title: 新加坡邮政因处理举报人报告解雇首席执行官
item.description: 新加坡邮政周日表示，在内部调查发现其首席执行官和另外两名高级经理对公司员工不当行为的举报人指控处理不当后，已将他们解职。【原文：Singapore Post said on Sunday it had dismissed its chief executive and two other senior managers after an internal investigation found they had mishandled whistleblower allegations about misconduct by company employees.】

item.title: 德国报纸报道，大众汽车公司经理将在削减奖金计划中减薪 10
item.description: 据《南德意志报》（Sueddeutsche Zeitung）周日报道，在德国大众汽车公司与工会达成裁员和缩减生产规模的协议后，该公司管理人员奖金的减少将导致未来两年减薪 10%。【原文：A reduction in managers' bonuses at Volkswagen will lead to a 10% pay cut for the next two years, the Sueddeutsche Zeitung newspaper reported on Sunday, after the German carmaker struck a deal with unions to axe jobs and scale back production.】

item.title: 据《日经新闻》报道，日本反垄断监督机构将认定谷歌在搜索案中违法
item.description: 据《日经亚洲》周日援引消息人士的话报道，日本竞争监督机构预计将认定谷歌违反了该国的反垄断法。【原文：Japan's competition watchdog is expected to find Google guilty of violating the country's antitrust law, Nikkei Asia reported on Sunday, citing sources.】

item.title: 星巴克工人在纽约等美国城市扩大罢工范围
item.description: 代表 10,000 多名咖啡师的星巴克工会周六晚些时候表示，星巴克工人已将罢工范围扩大到包括纽约在内的另外四个美国城市。【原文：Starbucks workers have expanded their strike to four more U.S. cities, including New York, the union representing over 10,000 baristas said late on Saturday.】

item.title: 中国尼奥公司将于 2025 年在欧洲推出 Firefly 电动车
item.description: 中国电动汽车（EV）制造商尼奥公司（Nio）周日宣布，计划于2025年上半年在欧洲推出萤火虫（Firefly）汽车。【原文：Chinese electric vehicle (EV) marker Nio on Sunday announced plans to launch its Firefly cars in Europe in the first half of 2025.】

item.title: 斯泰兰特撤销俄亥俄州吉普车厂裁员 1100 人的决定
item.description: 意大利汽车制造商 Stellantis 周六晚些时候表示，该公司已经撤销了在俄亥俄州吉普车厂裁员约 1100 人的决定，转而延长了工人调整和再培训通知期限。【原文：Stellantis has reversed its decision to lay off about 1,100 employees at an Ohio Jeep plant, instead extending a worker adjustment and retraining notification notice, the Franco-Italian automaker said late on Saturday.】

item.title: 法国总统马克龙支持埃塞俄比亚的债务重组努力
item.description: 法国总统埃马纽埃尔-马克龙周六表示全力支持埃塞俄比亚的债务重组努力，并强调需要 "在未来几周内 "迅速解决问题。【原文：French President Emmanuel Macron expressed full support on Saturday for Ethiopia's debt restructuring efforts, emphasising the need for a swift resolution "in the coming weeks".】

item.title: 墨西哥总统相信国会将在 2025 年禁止种植转基因玉米
item.description: 墨西哥总统克劳迪娅-希恩鲍姆（Claudia Sheinbaum）周六表示，她预计国会将于明年初批准禁止在该国种植转基因玉米。【原文：Mexican President Claudia Sheinbaum expects Congress to approve a ban early next year on planting genetically modified corn in the country, she said on Saturday.】
